alert.note: Alert for McHenry; Pierce; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:32AM CDT until July 10 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU...NORTHWESTERN PIERCE...NORTHEASTERN MCHENRY AND SOUTHWESTERN ROLETTE COUNTIES... At 532 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Barton, or 17 miles north of Rugby, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Bottineau, northwestern Pierce, northeastern McHenry and southwestern Rolette Counties, including the following locations... Overly and Omemee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
